page.title: 06Government-Winmarleigh
page.content: Winmarleigh has a{Parish Council}of 5 members,Jean Helme,George Marsland, John Thornton,Thomas Tomlinson and Richard Doran.The Council meets once a month in the Village Hall. The Parish is a member of{Wyre Borough to which Council,in conjunction with Cabus and Nateby,it elects one councillor currently Ian Simpson. In turn Wyre Borough is a constituent borough of{Lancashire County Council and Winmarleigh,together with about 8 neighbouring parishes, elects one County Councillor,at present Michael Fitzherbert-Brocholes. Although subject to frequent shifting Winmarleigh is now in the{Lancaster {Parliamentary Constituency}represented in the House by Elaine Kellett-Bowman.
